actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide commuter flexible spending arrangements.
short_title: Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2011

summary.text: Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2011 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain employer-provided transportation benefits (i.e., commuting and parking costs, transit passes) under tax-qualified flexible spending arrangements.

titles.title: Transportation Flexible Savings Accounts Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide commuter flexible spending arrangements.
